Name: INSPECTION AND TEST RECORD FOR: INGROUND PITS
Set-out pits and any other items in accordance with the IFC documentation ahead of commencing excavation
Ensure Drainage Holes are provided on bottom of pit
Ensure connected connection to Stormwater System where applicable.
Place bedding sand in bottom of trench.
Check that 100mm bedding sand is achieved.
Install Pit ensure levelled to correct RL
Take photos of pits prior to backfill.
Client to inspect pits prior to backfill.
Place and compact suitable material to remaining depth around pits inline with manufactures data sheet.
Ensure Pit Lids are clearly labelled with service type
Client to review completed ITC and confirm acceptance - final acceptance
